class.name: AwaitTweener
class.description: [AwaitTweener] is used to await a specified signal, allowing asynchronous steps in [Tween] animation. See [method Tween.tween_await] for more usage information.

method.name: set_timeout
method.description: Sets the maximum time an [AwaitTweener] can wait for the signal. Can be used as a safeguard for signals that may never be emitted. [param timeout] should be greater than [code]0[/code]. If not specified, the tweener will wait indefinitely.

method.name: set_unbinds
method.description: Allows to specify argument unbind when connecting to the signal (see [method Callable.unbind]). This is required when the signal emits with any arguments.
